start: ^Aw, you remembered my name! Yours is Jess, right?

c-0: ^Yeah!! It's Jessica, but I prefer my nickname Jess!
c-1: ^You got it! Could I get a small oatmilk latte?
g-0: ^I've been brainstorming ways on how to get the word out about my online clothing business. You'd think people at the clothing store I work at would be interested, but they're all sooooo...old.
^Hm...maybe you could advertise at a place where young people hang out.
^Maybe older people would like it too?

c-2: ^You're right. I need to think about where the hip baddies hang out.
c-3: ^I'm not sure someone over the age of 50 would wanna wear a bedazzled crop top...

g-1: ^This might be weird... but I was wondering if there's any way I could put a flyer up for my shop in the cafe? I know cool girls love coffee shops, so maybe it would help my store get exposure.
^Of course, I'd love that! I've been wanting to collab with other local businesses.
^I don't have a bulletin board, but you could leave it here on the counter.

c-4: ^Thanks so much Georgie!! I'll design the cutest flyer I can and bring it in tomorrow.

g-2: ^You'd think it would be easy to connect with other fashionistas, but despite my confident exterior, I get too intimidated to talk to them sometimes.
^You were able to make a connection with me so easily-- your energy is contagious! If I another fashion girly I would love to get to know you.
^I know, it's pretty intimidating talking to strangers, but I have to do it every day.

c-6: ^You're too sweet-- I'm glad to have gotten to meet you!
c-7: ^I guess I just need more practice.

g-3: ^I've gotta run! I wanna get home as soon as I can to get working on my flyer.
^Good luck! With your eye for design I know you'll create something cool.
